actionPack.name: Jetty
actionPack.description: Integration actions for the Jetty embeddable web server.  More information on Jetty available at jetty.apache.org.
actionPack.author: CA Technologies

SCRIPTAction.name: Jetty - Uninstall - Windows
SCRIPTAction.description: Uninstall Jetty from a Windows system using the provided installation folder.

outputParamList.name: Execution Output
outputParamList.description: Standard out from the command execution.

powerShellScript.content:
###########################################################
# AUTHOR  : Andrii Dziuba
# DATE    : 2014-03-07
# NAME    : UnInstall Jetty
###########################################################
 
#ERROR REPORTING ALL
Set-StrictMode -Version latest
 
#---------------------------------------------------------- 
#STATIC VARIABLES
#----------------------------------------------------------
$pathToFolder = "${Installation Directory}"

Function DeleteJar
{
	If (Test-Path $pathToFolder){
		Remove-Item -Recurse -Force $pathToFolder
		Write-Host "Folder: $pathToFolder is deleted"
		return
	}
	Else {
		Write-Host "ERROR# Folder: $pathToFolder not found"
	}
	
}
 
Function RunAll
{
	DeleteJar
}

#RUN SCRIPT
RunAll
"Done, Thank You"
